--- select_array_with_struct.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  UNNEST(ARRAY<STRUCT<x INT64, y STRING>>[(1, 'foo'), (3, 'bar')])

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Results: []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Star{
        Star: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From: 11,
      Source: &ast.Unnest{
        Unnest: 18,
        Rparen: 81,
        Expr: &ast.ArrayLiteral{
          Array: 25,
          Lbrack: 57,
          Rbrack: 80,
          Type: &ast.StructType{
            Struct: 31,
            Gt: 55,
            Fields: []*ast.StructField{
              &ast.StructField{
                Ident: &ast.Ident{
                  NamePos: 38,
                  NameEnd: 39,
                  Name: "x",
                },
                Type: &ast.SimpleType{
                  NamePos: 40,
                  Name: "INT64",
                },
              },
              &ast.StructField{
                Ident: &ast.Ident{
                  NamePos: 47,
                  NameEnd: 48,
                  Name: "y",
                },
                Type: &ast.SimpleType{
                  NamePos: 49,
                  Name: "STRING",
                },
              },
            },
          },
          Values: []ast.Expr{
            &ast.TupleStructLiteral{
              Lparen: 58,
              Rparen: 67,
              Values: []ast.Expr{
                &ast.IntLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 59,
                  ValueEnd: 60,
                  Base: 10,
                  Value: "1",
                },
                &ast.StringLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 62,
                  ValueEnd: 67,
                  Value: "foo",
                },
              },
            },
            &ast.TupleStructLiteral{
              Lparen: 70,
              Rparen: 79,
              Values: []ast.Expr{
                &ast.IntLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 71,
                  ValueEnd: 72,
                  Base: 10,
                  Value: "3",
                },
                &ast.StringLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 74,
                  ValueEnd: 79,
                  Value: "bar",
                },
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM UNNEST(ARRAY<STRUCT<x INT64, y STRING>>[(1, "foo"), (3, "bar")])
